properties.description: Query top 20 from Employees Delta table

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 20 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://storageprithwish.dfs.core.windows.net/delta-tables/Employees_Hist/part-00000-f6c1550a-f18d-4ec4-87c4-f7ed89b0f558-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
